page.title: 15The elderly in Marchwood
page.content: There are lots of facilities for the { {elderly in Marchwood.}There is a Darby and Joan club which provides a lot of activities for the old people.These include outings,concerts and whist drives,and it provides an opportunity for the elderly to meet each other and chat over a cup of tea. There is a welfare association for the elderly in Marchwood,which amongst other things helps provide a Christmas present for every pensioner in the parish. A clever {bell alarm system}has been installed in nearly every pensioner's house.If they are in trouble they push a button inside the house and a loud alarm will ring outside and alert neighbours.Wardened bungalows for the elderly are soon to be built in the centre of Marchwood close to the new shopping centre.
